text: Adolf Ogi (born 18 July 1942) was a Swiss politician. He was in office from 1987 to 2000. He was the President of the Swiss Confederation in 1993, preceding Otto Stich. Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Frutigen-Niedersimmental (administrative district) Category:People from the canton of Bern
title: Adolf Ogi
